DarkMouse::
She did as ordered and turned on her signal damper. She felt sort of 
silly. After all, wouldn't a strong fighting force anticipate such a 
trick? Then again, she remembered how Megatron would let his own ego 
outweigh his better judgement. So then again, she smiled and went 
along for the pit of it. 



--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  he stopped a mile before the base. "Everyone turn on thier signal 
blockers 
> should still be on. Follow me as I drill." He went into drill mode 
and dug 
> into the earth.
